original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify the tokens a under one of the following labels [I-LOC, B-ORG, O, B-PER, I-PER, I-MISC, B-MISC, I-ORG, B-LOC]. The format should be ["Token": "India", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", ..., ...]
optimised_prompt: Transform the input raw tokenized text into a structured output consisting of tokens paired with their corresponding Named Entity Recognition (NER) labels. Ensure that each token is labeled accurately under one of the following categories: [I-LOC, B-ORG, O, B-PER, I-PER, I-MISC, B-MISC, I-ORG, B-LOC]. Maintain the exact structure, format, and punctuation as described in the "Desired Outputs." For each token, include its label directly following it, separated by a space, and ensure no additional explanations or formatting changes are made.
